entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:37 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this evening then becoming northwest 20 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 1:37 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
